channel.title: Fictions on peregrinator's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fictions on peregrinator's blog

item.title: Ahab
item.description: The disturbed man woke from violent sleep. He wondered to himself of the soundness of his reasons for absence from the deck. His illness. The numerous days that were spent in solitude were of good use to him but wasn’t there a better and simpler way of achieving such a thing as confidence? One evasive whale and a megalomaniac at its ghostly tail. If there existed such means, could he have employed it?
